name: S.pace
description:
Use only Space button to use actions: dash to the right, dash to the left and attack.

Your goal is to destroy all enemies.

It is possible to win but not easy.

The Game was made on

The GMTK Game Jam

Game was made by Shepelin Dmitry and Sezen Deniz.

Music: 

Nimff - ＳｙｎｔｈＣｉｔｙ

c152 - reality is dead
